# Content

**Associated Type**

The type of shape this can provide.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Content : Shape
```

## Getting the shape

- **shape**: The shape that this type draws and provides for other drawing operations.

items.description: The shape that this type draws and provides for other drawing operations.
items.name: shape
